allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "Fix product combobox in inventario-carro dialog" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary
- Replace broken cmdk-based combobox with custom implementation that works correctly inside Dialog modals
- The previous implementation had z-index and portal conflicts causing hover/click events to not reach the dropdown items
- New ProductCombobox renders inline \(no portals\) with proper event handling

## Changes
- **src/app/inventario-carro/page.tsx**: Rebuilt ProductCombobox from scratch using simple HTML elements
- Added shadcn combobox component for potential future use
- Minor improvements to command.tsx and popover.tsx

## Test plan
- [ ] Open Inventario Carro page
- [ ] Click "Agregar carga" to open the Nueva carga dialog
- [ ] Click on the product combobox dropdown
- [ ] Verify hover highlighting works on dropdown items
- [ ] Verify clicking an item selects it and closes the dropdown
- [ ] Verify keyboard navigation \(arrow keys, Enter, Escape\) works

EOF
\)")
